Notify the host by canceling your registration.Get Ready for the EventProfile Complete · Reminder: SMS & EmailYour ProfileSoumil ChughUpdate ProfileConfigure RemindersEmailSMSRegistration ClosedThis event is not currently taking registrations. You may contact the host or subscribe to receive updates.About Event​Brave Career x UofT AI Collective Student Club​Build Fast. Win Big. Get Discovered.Join our VC-backed hackathon where builders become founders. In just 8 hours, you'll turn raw ideas into real products—no fluff, just code, creativity, and traction.​Whether you're a hacker, designer, or aspiring founder, this is your chance to:🚀 Launch your MVP with AI + modern web stacks🧠 Learn from top engineers and product mentors💼 Get in front of VCs, hiring managers, and tech leaders🏆 Win cash prizes ($500 - $1000), exclusive swag, and potentially $50,000 ANGEL INVESTMENT​Meet the InvestorsThis hackathon isn’t just about building—it’s about getting noticed. We’ve invited a select group of early-stage VCs and angel investors actively scouting for the next breakout founders:​Mohan, Principal @ Sixty Degree Capital​Daniel, early stage VC @ Celtic House Asia Partners​Edward, Angel Investor, co-Founder & COO @ JRVS​Shaohang, Angel Investor, Founder @ Athena AI​Masih, Angel Investor​Dev'Roux, Angel Investor & Researcher​Tiffany, AI Investor​Raymond, Angel Investor, VP at ACCE​Impress them, and your weekend project could become your next company.​No slide decks. Just product.Apply now and prove what you can build in a weekend.​​Location is tentative and may change to a larger venue in downtown Toronto, depending on the number of signups.LocationMyhal Centre for Engineering Innovation and Entrepreneurship (MY)55 St George St, Toronto, ON M5S 0C9, CanadaPresented byBrave CareerSubscribeHosted ByYuuuzzzAksshatt BariarYiming ChenThe AI CollectiveContact the HostReport EventAIDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

result.slide_html:
One-person Unicorn Hackathon: A Professional Venture
Overview of the One-person Unicorn Hackathon initiative and its VC backing, highlighting its unique approach to event creation and hosting.
  • Presented by Brave Career
  • Hosted by industry leaders Yuuuzzz, Aksshatt Bariar, and Yiming Chen
  • Sponsored by The AI Collective, underscoring the event's focus on cutting-edge technology
  • Subscription available for continued insights into future events and developments
  • Direct contact with hosts enables participants to engage with mentors and experts in innovation
Key Insight: The event is a pioneer in providing a platform for single-person-driven unicorn startups with potential VC interest.
